title: Buying history
body:
Hey i was wondering if there was a way to find my ENTIRE purchase history too see what type of stuff i have bought and when i did? I know how to check purchase history but i wanna see ALL of it since i was lv 1 and thought garen was cool 

{{champion:86}}

replies.body: We may be able to help with this!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can look into this for you.  Since the purchase history is sensitive information, you may need to verify ownership with them first.  We'll respond asap!
